info.title: Module Loader
info.description: Loads and executes the module with the given id and action (in case of auxiliary)

method.name: load
method.description: Loads and executes a given module

parameter.name: $viewName
parameter.description: The module's view name. If empty, get the default module's view name. It is empty by default.

method.name: incLoadingDepth
method.description: Increase the loading depth of modules by one.

method.name: decLoadingDepth
method.description: Decrease the loading depth of modules by one.

method.name: getLoadingDepth
method.description: Get the current module's loading depth, starting from 0.

method.name: getModuleResources
method.description: Get all the loading module related resources.
method.returndescription: An array of resource id as key and as value an array of resource css and js data.

method.name: getModuleRsrcArray
method.description: Get the given module's resource array including the inner modules.

parameter.name: $moduleID
parameter.description: The module id to get the resource from.

method.returndescription: An array of resources by id. The array has a key of the resource id and a value of the resource attributes. For testers, it includes as extra information the module id and the tester mode.

method.name: checkAuth
method.description: Checks if the user can execute given the access status.
method.returndescription: True if user can execute, HTMLPageReport content otherwise.
